name: Anacarp
description:
Anacarp is an adventure into insecurities and fears. A continuous escape against the inner monster in ourselves …..

Help paprika to solve puzzles and avoid being reached by the monster.

                                                                                 

                                          FEATURES 

  • Run and resolve puzzles before the monster reach you.
  •  Levels based on Paprika's fears.
  • Use everything you find to your advantage, including little friends.
  • Hardcore game, no save points.
